cast.name: 奥雷·莫雷曼斯 Aurélie Moeremans
格尼德拉·毕摩 Ganindra Bimo

writer.name: 泰迪·索里亚阿特玛贾 Teddy Soeriaatmadja

director.name: 泰迪·索里亚阿特玛贾 Teddy Soeriaatmadja

introduction: For Bayu (Arya Saloka) who owns a vinyl store in the Santa area, the desire to go to the biggest annual Djakarta Warehouse Project (DWP) music festival is not a priority. His principle does not change even though his friends Rico (Arya Vasco), Kevin (Raka Hutchision) and Adi (Bio One) force him to come to the event. The principle was cut off when accidentally Sarah (Aurelie Moeremans) comes to the shop during the day before the event began. Sarah makes Bayu curious and interested in her. Bayu decidea to come to the event with Sarah and immediately contact her friends. On a trip with Sarah, Bayu finda many irregularities and bad luck that unwittingly come from Sarah and his friends.
